scenario_text.value: Man, this makes me sick...

Yeah, everyone here are just kids.
How could they do this...?

Who cares about size? The ones we gotta beat
down for this sure friggin’ didn’t.
(It’s rare to see Ryo mad like this.)

(He’s right, the vicious jerks who did this
don’t give a damn about us.)

(For now, we have to see if anyone else is
safe out there.)
(What should I say to Ryo?)
You’re really mad.
No need to hold back.
Let’s find survivors.
You’re really mad.
It’s rare to see you so mad, Ryo.
I guess. But seeing this just pisses me off!
I hear you. We have to save them somehow.
Yeah, I know.
No need to hold back.

If the enemy doesn’t care about us, then
there’s no need to hold back.

We don’t know what they’re after, but let’s
do all we can to get in their way.

Heh, now you’re talking! I feel the same way,
of course.

We’ll throw a wrench in their plans. Let’s
give ’em a headache they won’t soon forget!
Let’s find survivors.

We should look for anyone safe out there.
We have to save as many kids as we can.
Yeah, I know.

Me and Kunemon will scope out this area for
now. You look somewhere else, Takuma.
Sure, leave it to me!
Let’s go, Kunemon.
Kew!

Damn, I got a bad feeling about this. We
gotta smoke out as many survivors as we can.
